table.name: pin_survey
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `pin_survey` ( `surveyid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `assignedid` INT(19) DEFAULT NULL, `salesorderid` INT(19) DEFAULT NULL, `surveystatus` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `results` VARCHAR(512) DEFAULT NULL, `attempt` TIMESTAMP NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`surveyid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
